name: Dice of Life (darcytimms)
description:
Dice of Life is my entry for the Game Maker's Toolkit game jam, and is a platformer that is built around the prompt "Roll of the Dice", it involves the player rolling dice to determine their path, and shows the consequences of actions that are beyond your control. 

CONTROLS:
Up Arrow: Jump
Left/Right Arrow: Walk Left/Right
Down Arrow: Roll Dice
